definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: sun-pillar, used in idolatrous worship (v. Thes:489 ff. RS:Sem. i, 469, Lag:M i, 228 Now: Arch. ii, 302; = Palm. [[חמנא]] Vog:No. 123 a; Ph. [[לבעל חמן]] oft. as epithet of solar Baal);—only pl. abs. [[חַמָּנִים]] Is 27:9 + 4 t.; sf. [[חַמָּנֵיכֶם]] Le 26:30 + 2 t.; ‖[[בָּמוֹת]] Le 26:30 (H), 2Ch 14:4, cf. Ez Eze 6:4, Eze 6:6; ‖[[מזבחות]] [[הבעלים]] 2Ch 34:4; ‖[[אשׁרים]] Is 17:8, Is 27:9; ‖[[אשׁרים]] and [[פְּסִלִים]] 2Ch 34:7.
